data.name: EverydayPlus Account
data.description:
Introducing the BOQ Specialist Everyday Plus account. The only everyday account that allows you to earn Qantas reward points. There are no establishment or account keeping fees and you can redeem your Qantas Points for flights, holidays and more. It’s an everyday account that’s more rewarding.
When you become a BOQ Specialist client, you will be matched with a dedicated financial specialist who can assist with all of your personal and business banking needs. You will also benefit from onshore support with our Client Service Centre 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

eligibility.additionalInfo: Exclusively available to medical professionals and accountants

features.additionalInfo: Easily access your funds using your Visa debit card, via online banking and our mobile app including BPAY® and Pay Anyone functionality
Free ATM withdrawals at BOQ branded ATM’s as well as the four major banks Australia wide
Earn 1 Frequent Flyer Point for every $20 of daily average balance in your account, calculated at the end of each month and paid on balances up to $100 000

When you become a BOQ Specialist client, you will be matched with a dedicated financial specialist who can assist with all of your personal and business banking needs. You will also benefit from onshore support with our Client Service Centre 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
No establishment or account keeping fees
